original_title: Contact your Grama Niladharis for enumeration of electors 2023
original_body_lines: The Elections Commission today requested people to contact their respective Grama Niladharis for the enumeration of electors in 2023.
It requested the public to inquire with the Grama Niladhari immediately if he or she has not visited their homes by 31 May.
Also, people are requested to visit the Elections Commission website at www.elections.gov.lk (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
